attributes.action: Make Parent and child bays for permit holders only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like petition to have Parent and Child bays only available to permit holders. Parents should be issued with permits, to work the same as the permits for disabled drivers, the offender who abuses the bays get clamped with a fine or penalty to have the clamp removed, with the proceeds of the fines to possibly go to a childrens charity. 

The parent and child bays should also include pregnant women who are past a certain stage in pregnancy, i.e. get a permit issed on the strength of producing a MATb1 form, or issue by their midwife and to be valid until the child reaches a suitable age. 

In the instance of more than 1 child this should be based on the age of the youngest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
